I was a bit skeptical since the hotel had recommended the place, however, we decided to give it a try.  We were quite surprised!  We had a great meal including tapas, starters, salads, main course, etc.  I had a view into the kitchen and was watching the chef checking all of the dishes as they left the kitchen.  The service was awesome.  We were there a long time and never felt rushed.  I would, absolutely, go back again.
